PURCHASE NECESSARY .PURCHASE WILL NOT INCREASE THE CHANCES OF WINNING .Eligibility : These are the Official Rules for the Little Hug " Barrel Full of Cash Promotion " ( the " Promotion " ) .The Promotion is open to legal U.S. residents residing in the fifty ( 50 ) United States and Washington D.C. who are at least eighteen ( 18 ) years of age or older .The Promotion is subject to all applicable federal , state and local laws and regulations .Void in Puerto Rico and where prohibited or restricted by law .Participation in the Promotion constitutes the participant 's full and unconditional agreement to these Official Rules and Sponsor 's and Administrator 's decisions , which are final and binding in all matters related to the Promotion .Winning a prize is contingent upon fulfilling all requirements set forth herein .Promotion is void where prohibited by law .Sponsor : American Beverage Corporation , One Daily Way , Verona , PA 15147 .Administrator : CCM Marketing , 11 E 47th St. , New York , NY 10017 .Promotion Structure : The Promotion consists of an in - pack Instant Win Game ( the " Game " ) and an online random draw sweepstakes ( the " Sweepstakes " ) .Additional random prize drawings will be conducted among entrants who enter the Sweepstakes via the entry form on the Little Hug Facebook Page .To Play the Game : 1 ) Look inside specially marked Little Hug Original Variety Pack Cartons ( 20 ct . )( " Participating Packages " ) for a winning Game piece .If your specially marked package contains a winning Game piece inside , then you win the prize indicated on your winning Game piece , subject to verification and fulfillment of redemption instructions .For instructions on how to redeem prize see section # 9 .Winning Game pieces are subject to verification of authenticity by Sponsor .Non - winning packages will not contain a Game piece ( e.g. printed Game piece ) nor will they contain a " Sorry " message . 2 ) No purchase is necessary to play the Game , and a purchase will not increase the chances of winning .

Complete all of the required information , including a valid email address , and follow the instructions for submitting a Review .By entering the sweepstakes , you agree to make a disclosure with your entry as provided on the Rating and Review submission form to be eligible to participate in the sweepstakes .Your Review will not be eligible as an entry in Rate & Win if you do not comply with the appropriate Guidelines and Terms of Use .Only Reviews that are posted on the Behr Facebook Page - Reviews will result in an online entry .Photos may be included but are not required and must comply with the Guidelines and Terms of Use .You may submit one ( l )Review per product for as many products as you like for posting ; however , the maximum number of entries you will receive is one(1 ) entry per person / email address in this Sweepstakes , per Entry Period .Limit one(1 ) entry per person / email address in this ( whether submitted online or through the alternate method of entry provided in Paragraph 4 below ) .Proof of sending or submission will not be deemed proof of receipt by Sponsor .You can not change your Review after it has been submitted .Reviews become the sole property of Sponsor and will not be returned .Limit one ( 1 ) entry per person / email address ( whether submitted online as provided in Paragraph 3 or by mail ) .A mail - in entry must be post marked before the end of the Promotion Period , and received by Sponsor within seven(7 ) days of expiration of the applicable Entry Period .Any mail - in entry received after that date will not be eligible .Any mail entry that does not include both the entrant 's name and email address will not be eligible .Each entry must be mailed separately .DISQUALIFYING EVENTS : You must submit a valid email address when you submit any entry .Use of any automated system to participate is prohibited and will result in disqualification .The odds of winning depend on the total number of eligible Entries received during the Entry Period .Non - winning entries will not be carried over into subsequent Entry Period drawings .The potential winner will be notified by email .Sponsor shall not be responsible for any delays in awarding any prize for any reason .PRIZE AND APPROXIMATE RETAIL VALUE ( " ARV " ) .There will be one ( 1 ) Sweepstakes Prize per Entry Period ( total of ( 12 ) during the Promotion Period ) , each consisting of one ( 1 ) $ 200 The Home Depot ® Gift Card .The prize is not transferable or assignable and may not be substituted or redeemed for cash either in whole or in part .No cash or other substitution may be made except by Sponsor , who reserves the right , in Sponsor 's sole discretion , to substitute the prize with another prize of equal or greater value .Gift cards may be subject to additional terms and conditions imposed by the issuer .

.One ( 1 ) $ 1,500 cash prize is available .Two ( 2 ) $ 500 cash prizes are available .Odds of winning : 1:275,000 .UNCLAIMED / UNREDEEMED GAME PRIZES WILL NOT BE AWARDED .SWEEPSTAKES PRIZES : One ( 1 ) $ 1,000 cash prize is available .Two ( 2 ) $ 500 cash prizes are available .Four ( 4 ) $ 250 cash prizes are available .FACEBOOK PRIZES : 182 Facebook winners will each receive one ( 1 ) backpack including Little Hug Coupon redeemable for up to $ 4 .( Approximate prize retail value of $ 9.50 ) .Total value of all prizes : $ 12,138 .Limit one ( 1 ) Sweepstakes prize and one ( 1 ) Game prize per person and/or email address .Winners are responsible for all taxes associated with prize receipt .Winners of prizes valued at $ 600 or more will receive an IRS 1099 form for the total value of the prize received following prize fulfillment .Any potential prize winner may be required to execute an Affidavit of Eligibility , a Liability Release , an IRS W9 form , and ( where imposing such condition is legal ) a Publicity Release ( collectively , " Prize Claim Documents " ) .If winner fails or refuses to sign and return all Prize Claim Documents within five ( 5 ) days of prize notification ( or a shorter time if required by exigencies ) , winner may be disqualified and an alternate winner may be selected .All costs and expenses incurred in connection with redeeming , accepting , or using a prize that are not specifically provided for herein are solely the responsibility of the applicable prize winner .Prizes not claimed in accordance with these Official Rules will not be awarded .Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize for another of equal or greater value .The potential Sweepstakes prize winners will be notified by telephone and/or mail and/or e - mail , using the contact information provided or collected at the time of registration .Sponsor shall have no liability for any Sweepstakes prize winner notification that is lost , stolen , intercepted , or not received by a potential Sweepstakes winner for any reason .In the event that a potential winner of a Sweepstakes prize is disqualified for any reason , Sponsor will award the applicable prize to an alternate winner by random drawing from among all remaining eligible entries .Sponsor , in its sole discretion , will attempt to contact up to two ( 2 ) potential Sweepstakes prize winners in accordance with the above procedure , after which the Sweepstakes prize in question may go un - awarded if it remains unclaimed .

party product names , logos , brands , and trademarks shown on this website are the property of their respective owners .Canon 6D DSLR Giveaway OFFICIAL RULES 1 .NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER .PURCHASE DOES NOT INCREASE YOUR CHANCE OF WINNING .MUST BE 18 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER AT THE TIME OF ENTRY .VOID WHERE PROHIBITED .DESCRIPTION AND PERIOD : Premiumbeat 's Canon 6D DSLR GIveaway Sweepstakes ( the " Sweepstakes " ) begins May 6 , 2013 at 12:00AM PST and ends May 31 , 2013 at 11:59PM PST .During the Promotion Period , consumers are invited to log on to the sweepstakes website to enter for a chance to win the prize .CAN I PARTICIPATE ?In the event the potential winner is ineligible to participate , an alternate winner will be selected by a random drawing .This Sweepstakes is void where prohibited by law .HOW DO I ENTER ?You will get an additional 2 chances to win for every participant you refer through our " Invite friends " tool .There is no fee or charge to become a member of Facebook .Limit : one ( 1 ) entry per person per day , gain 2 additional entries each time a person you have referred registers during the duration of the promotion .Any individual , in the sole discretion of Sponsor , suspected of using multiple identities to submit entries in excess of the disclosed maximum , by any means , including but not limited to establishing multiple e - mail or Facebook accounts , will be disqualified from participation in this Sweepstakes .The name of the person submitting the Sweepstakes entry must be the authorized account holder of such email and Facebook account , otherwise , entry may be deemed void .It is the sole responsibility of the entrant to notify the Sponsor in writing if the entrant changes his or her Facebook account or email during the Promotional Period .Proof of submission of entry does not constitute proof of delivery or entry .All entries become the property of Sponsor and will not be returned to entrant .WHAT CAN I WIN ?One random winner will receive a new Canon 6D DSLR camera body .Premiumbeat will cover the cost of the camera and shipping to winner .In the event the camera is unavailable , winner can choose another camera product less or equal to $ 1,999 .

mail address provided in connection with the Prize Winner 's Entry within a week of the Random Drawing , at Sponsor 's discretion .Potential Winners must respond within seventy - two ( 72 ) hours of notification attempt .Failure to respond to notification within the stated time will result in forfeiture of the Prize .Awarding of any prize is subject to verification of potential Winner 's eligibility and full compliance with these Official Rules .Except where prohibited , the selected potential Winners may be required to complete and return to Sponsor or its designated agent an Affidavit of Eligibility and a Liability / Publicity Release Form ( " Affidavit and Release " ) within three ( 3 ) days of receiving the Affidavit and Release .Failure to return the signed Affidavit and Release within three ( 3 ) days following the date of delivery thereof may result in forfeiture of the Prize .If a potential Prize Winner is a minor ( " Minor " ) in his / her state of residence , the parent or legal guardian of the Minor will be required to ratify the Affidavit and Release in order for the Prize to be awarded to the Minor .Up to three ( 3 ) alternate winner drawings may be conducted for each un - awarded Prize , after which the Prize will remain un - awarded .PRIZES .Total ARV of Grand Prize : $ 935.98 USD .Total ARV of Second Place Prize : $ 635.99 USD .Total ARV of all Prizes to be awarded in this Promotion : $ 2,147.98 USD .Allow 8 - 10 weeks for delivery of Prize .Unclaimed prizes will not be awarded .Microsoft and Xbox 360 are registered trademarks , and used for purposes of prize description only and such use is not intended to suggest or imply the sponsorship , endorsement , or the approval this Sweepstakes .ENTRY AWARDS .All Entrants to Promotion during the Promotion Period will receive a code upon completing their initial Entry through any of the two entry methods described above .
